name: Football Game 2023: Real Kick
description:
Football League Soccer Game 2023 puts you in live penalty online soccer action with an Aesthetic look and brand new attributes! Build your dream team from licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best football Leagues! Rise through Football world whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, fascinating in-game commentary, team personalisation and much more. The beautiful new game 2023 has never been so good!

BUILD YOUR Dream Soccer Strike TEAM
Sign top superstar players to create your very own Dream super Star Team! Perfectly idealize your style, customize your players and create any team who do wonders in your way as you stand up through the Football battle. Upgrade your player with world-class costume facilities as you make your way to the Soccer strike. Have you got what it takes?

NEW AND UPGRADED SPORTS GAMEPLAY
An immersive Football League Soccer experience awaits with new animations and enhanced AI to restructured the football experience of shoot and score on mobile. Football League Soccer Game 3D continues to grab the true spirit of the Multiplayer Football Game

DRESSED FOR SUCCESS OF HERO 2023
Treat your eyes on a Deluxe Football League Soccer Strike experience! personalize your player from a host of different options including appearance and outfits. Along with our new and upgraded graphics engine, your dream super team players have never looked this good!

CONQUER THE FOOTBALL WORLD
Live penalty sports Game puts your club against other first class teams. While playing football cup 2023 prove your teams' potential and compete in Global efootball super league and Events for especial prizes!

FEATURES
• Build and develop your super star team from licensed football players
• Full 3D motion-captured strikes, Kits, celebrations and goalkeeper saves gives matchless realism
• Reach legendary status as you rise through football league and compete in online football battle  
• Build your soccer domain from your own Stadium to Commercial and Training facilities
• fascinating and exciting match commentary keeps you in the heart of the action
• Personalise your team’s kit and logo or import your own designs
• Take part in regular football battle and events to win unbeaten achievements
• Compete against players from across the world with Football League Soccer live Game
• Exclusive soundtrack featuring, KIT and more!

* Please note: This game is free to play, but additional content and in-game items may be purchased for real money.
* This game requires an internet connection and contains third party advertising.
